name: Hasty Hues
description:
This is the original concept Hasty Hues 3D is based off of. This version is much faster and doesn't feature the customize options of the newer application.

Make your way through various obstacles, as you smash the matching tiles and avoid spike traps. Collect power-ups along the way to increase speed, as well as gaining invincibility. Earning points will get you stars, and collecting all five in each stage awards you the perfect score!
